backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, mapped files, components, and test IDs for the report‑card app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH theme variables and print-friendly styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing mark states, attendance, results, layout, and print action.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Atten: Inputs for attendance counts, result text, and remarks with structured styling.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/CoSch: Editable table for co‑scholastic field grades (half‑yearly and annual).
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Repor: Layout wrapper adding background image, headers, and container styling for the report card.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Schol: Main marks table handling unit tests, HY/AE inputs, validation, and calculated weighted totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode settings, and print-specific formatting for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/defaultData.ts: Exports default subject and field mark rows used to initialize the report card tables.
frontend/src/lib/marks.ts: Contains mark parsing, calculation helpers, and functions to compute totals and percentages across subjects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for subjects, fields, attendance data, and computed column totals.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Implements basic numeric validation for mark ranges and non‑negative checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, custom colors, plugins, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, existing features, and state for building the marks-entry report card app.
